name: NSExtensionItem
desc: An immutable collection of values representing different aspects of an item for an extension to act upon.

items.name: var attributedTitle: NSAttributedString?
items.desc: An optional title for the item.

items.name: var userInfo: [AnyHashable : Any]?
items.desc: An optional dictionary of keys and values corresponding to the extension itemâ€™s properties.

items.name: var attachments: [NSItemProvider]?
items.desc: An optional array of media data associated with the extension item.

items.name: var attributedContentText: NSAttributedString?
items.desc: An optional string describing the extension item content.
